about_the_game:
Continue your career in Vital Signs: Emergency Department with this downloadable content pack. Focus solely on the nine newly added patients by completing the Injuries Cases #2 scenario that comes with this pack, or encounter them during the course of a 2 or 4 hour random shift!

New patients included with this Injuries Package #2:

  • 13yo M with Ankle Injury
  • 36yo M s/p motor cycle collision
  • 6yo M with Arm Pain
  • 15yo F with Suicidal Ingestion attempt
  • 45yo M s/p GSW to LLE, RUE, buttock
  • 8yo M with Arm Pain
  • 23yo F s/p fall from 15 foot balcony
  • 2yo M with Arm Pain
  • 17yo F with Ankle Injury
detailed_description:
Continue your career in Vital Signs: Emergency Department with this downloadable content pack. Focus solely on the nine newly added patients by completing the Injuries Cases #2 scenario that comes with this pack, or encounter them during the course of a 2 or 4 hour random shift!

New patients included with this Injuries Package #2:

  • 13yo M with Ankle Injury
  • 36yo M s/p motor cycle collision
  • 6yo M with Arm Pain
  • 15yo F with Suicidal Ingestion attempt
  • 45yo M s/p GSW to LLE, RUE, buttock

  • 23yo F s/p fall from 15 foot balcony

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 320 M
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 Sierra or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 | Intel i5 Skylake
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
